Package Brick.Break.Wall

Class Wall

java.lang.Object
Brick.Break.Wall.Wall
public class Wall
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Model of Wall in the Wall MVC design pattern.

  • Constructor Details

    • Wall

      public Wall​(java.awt.Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, java.awt.Point ballPos)
      This is the constructor of "Wall" class. This constructor holds the data that required initialization once its object is created.
      Parameters:
      drawArea - This parameter is the size of the game.
      brickCount - This parameter is the total amount of bricks.
      lineCount - This parameter is the total layer of bricks.
      brickDimensionRatio - This parameter is the ratio size of each brick in a level.
      ballPos - This parameter is the position of the ball.
